quotes.quote: I may not have gone where I intended to go, but I think I have ended up where I intended to be.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: I just invent, then wait until man comes around to needing what I've invented.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Ultimately, we wish the joy of perfect union with the person we love.
quotes.author: Mortimer Adler

quotes.quote: Nature's music is never over; her silences are pauses, not conclusions.
quotes.author: Mary Webb

quotes.quote: Art is the proper task of life.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
